UI01.name: Search with valid employee name
UI01.description: Verify that the search function correctly retrieves performance reviews when a valid employee name is entered

UI02.name: Input numeric value in employee name field
UI02.description: Verify that the system accepts numeric characters in the Employee Name field

UI03.name: Input special character (@)
UI03.description: Verify that special characters in the Employee Name field are properly handled during search

UI04.name: Input 100 characters string
UI04.description: Verify that the Employee Name field accepts the maximum allowed length of 100 characters

UI05.name: Input very long string (>150 characters)
UI05.description: Verify that the system displays appropriate validation error when Employee Name exceeds 100 characters

UI06.name: Search with empty field
UI06.description: Verify that leaving the Employee Name field empty returns all performance reviews without filtering

UI07.name: Input whitespace characters
UI07.description: Verify that entering only whitespace characters in Employee Name field is properly validated

UI08.name: SQL Injection test
UI08.description: Verify that SQL injection attempts are properly sanitized

UI09.name: XSS Attack test
UI09.description: Verify that JavaScript/HTML script tags are escaped and not executed

UI10.name: Input Vietnamese Unicode characters
UI10.description: Verify that the system correctly handles Vietnamese characters with diacritics

UI11.name: Click Review Period dropdown
UI11.description: Verify that selecting a specific Job Title from the dropdown filters performance reviews

UI12.name: Job Title filter
UI12.description: Verify that selecting a specific Job Title filters reviews to show only employees with that job title

UI13.name: Sub Unit filter
UI13.description: Verify that selecting a Sub Unit filters reviews to show only employees in that organizational unit

UI14.name: Review Status filter
UI14.description: Verify that selecting a Review Status filters reviews to show only reviews in that specific status

UI15.name: Date range YYYY-MM-DD
UI15.description: Verify that entering dates in correct YYYY-MM-DD format successfully filters performance reviews

UI16.name: Invalid date format
UI16.description: Verify that entering dates in incorrect format triggers validation error

UI17.name: Invalid date (Feb 30)
UI17.description: Verify that entering non-existent dates triggers appropriate validation error

UI18.name: From Date > To Date validation
UI18.description: Verify that entering a From Date later than To Date triggers validation error

UI19.name: Same From/To Date
UI19.description: Verify that entering identical From Date and To Date successfully searches for reviews on that single date

UI20.name: Future dates
UI20.description: Verify system behavior when searching with future dates

UI21.name: Only From Date
UI21.description: Verify that entering only From Date searches from that date to system-determined end date

UI22.name: Only To Date
UI22.description: Verify that entering only To Date searches from system-determined start date to specified To Date

UI23.name: Leap year Feb 29
UI23.description: Verify that the system correctly handles February 29 in leap years as a valid date

UI24.name: Partial name search
UI24.description: Verify that entering a partial employee name returns validation error (no employee named 'Joh')
